ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared
Interface MeasurementFactory

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface MeasurementFactory
extends java.rmi.Remote

A class being able to construct new measurements.

Author:
Moritz Lang
See Also:
Measurement

Method Summary

Method Detail

createConfigurableMeasurement

ConfigurableMeasurement createConfigurableMeasurement()
                                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Creates a new empty measurement which is configurable by the user. Same as createConfigurableMeasurement(-1).

Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

createConfigurableMeasurement

ConfigurableMeasurement createConfigurableMeasurement(int measurementRuntime)
                                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Creates a new empty measurement which is configurable by the user.

Parameters:
measurementRuntime - Total maximal runtime of measurement in milliseconds. After this time the measurement will be automatically canceled. Set to -1 for unlimited maximal runtime.
Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

createConfigurableMeasurement

ConfigurableMeasurement createConfigurableMeasurement(ConfigurableMeasurementConfigurationDTO configuration)
                                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                             MeasurementConfigurationException
Creates a new measurement and configures it according to the provided configuration. Same as createConfigurableMeasurement(configuration, null).

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration for the measurement.
Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementConfigurationException

createMicroplateMeasurement

ConfigurableMeasurement createMicroplateMeasurement(MicroplateMeasurementConfigurationDTO configuration)
                                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                           MeasurementConfigurationException
Creates a new microplate measurement and configures it according to the provided configuration. Same as createMicroplateMeasurement(configuration, null).

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration for the measurement.
Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementConfigurationException

createConfigurableMeasurement

ConfigurableMeasurement createConfigurableMeasurement(ConfigurableMeasurementConfigurationDTO configuration,
                                                      RemoteScriptEngineManager scriptEngineManager)
                                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                             MeasurementConfigurationException
Creates a new measurement and configures it according to the provided configuration.

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration for the measurement.
scriptEngineManager - The script engine manager to obtain the script engines which should run on the client side.
Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementConfigurationException

createMicroplateMeasurement

ConfigurableMeasurement createMicroplateMeasurement(MicroplateMeasurementConfigurationDTO configuration,
                                                    RemoteScriptEngineManager scriptEngineManager)
                                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                           MeasurementConfigurationException
Creates a new microplate measurement and configures it according to the provided configuration.

Parameters:
configuration - The configuration for the measurement.
scriptEngineManager - The script engine manager to obtain the script engines which should run on the client side.
Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementConfigurationException

createContinousMeasurement

ContinousMeasurement createContinousMeasurement(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                                java.lang.String channel,
                                                int imagingPeriod,
                                                double exposure)
                                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Creates a measurement with the default camera which is continuously making images with a period of imagingPeriod.

Parameters:
configGroup - The device group where the channel is defined.
channel - The channel where the images should be made. NULL if actual settings should be used.
imagingPeriod - The imaging period in milliseconds.
exposure - Exposure in milliseconds.
Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

createParallelContinousMeasurement

ContinousMeasurement createParallelContinousMeasurement(java.lang.String configGroup,
                                                        java.lang.String channel,
                                                        java.lang.String[] cameras,
                                                        double[] exposures,
                                                        int[] imagingPeriods)
                                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Creates a measurement with the given cameras which are continuously and in parallel making images with periods of imagingPeriods.

Parameters:
configGroup - The device group where the channel is defined.
channel - The channel where the images should be made. NULL if actual settings should be used.
cameras - Names of devices corresponding to the cameras.
imagingPeriods - The imaging periods in milliseconds.
exposures - Exposures in milliseconds.
Returns:
The measurement object.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
